About KiriKiri Z

KiriKiri Z is a KiriKiri 2 fork project aimed at supporting VC builds, removing legacy features, and adding modern features.
For TJS2 syntax, please refer to the TJS2 Help.
This documentation focuses on KiriKiri classes.

Author Contact Information

Author: W.Dee <dee@kikyou.info>
For KiriKiri Z, please contact @jin1016.
